title: Kim Kardashian is 39! Kris Jenner is the first to wish the beauty a happy birthday
text:
Kim Kardashian turned 39-years-old on Monday.

And in Kardashian/Jenner tradition, the family took to social media to wish the KKW Beauty mogul a very happy birthday.

Momager Kris Jenner was the first as she shared several adorable photos of Mrs Kanye West on Instagram.

Her #1: Kim Kardashian turned 39-years-old on Monday. And in Kardashian/Jenner tradition, the family took to social media to wish the KKW Beauty mogul a very happy birthday; with Kris Jenner

Baby KK: Momager Jenner was the first as she shared several adorable photos of Mrs Kanye West on Instagram

'Happy Birthday to my beautiful daughter @kimkardashian!' began the sweet note.

'You are such a force of nature. You are an incredible daughter, mommy, wife friend and sister.

'Thank you for shining your bright light on everyone you love.'

What a cutie: 'Happy Birthday to my beautiful daughter @kimkardashian!' began the note. 'You are such a force of nature. You are an incredible daughter, mommy, wife friend and sister'

Leader of the pack: Kris, 63, added, 'You are always leading the way and showing us your true super power with how you are always reaching out to others'

Kris, 63, added, 'You are always leading the way and showing us your true super power with how you are always reaching out to others.

'You are so kind, generous, and compassionate and I’m so proud of the amazing woman you have grown into.'

Jenner then gushed: 'I love you so much and I’m beyond blessed to be your Mom. Have the best birthday and year ever.'

Kris signed off with: '❤️ Mommy xoxo #HappyBirthdayKim.'
